name: u_k_songs
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool billboard_api.
Tool description: Providing the Billboard chart rankings and information on titles, artists, lyrics, images, and more. 
API description: Fetches the U.K. Songs chart information for a specific date and range from the Billboard API.

date.description: The date for which the chart information is requested, in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

range.description: The range of the chart data to fetch.
